title: Stablecoins Will Be Bigger Than Bitcoin
contentSnippet: The success of stablecoins isn’t about speculation but about efficient utility — they are quietly becoming the most-used form of digital currency around the world, writes CoinFund’s David Pakman.

title: Hollywood’s Next Financier: You
contentSnippet: Tokenization is giving fans the power to greenlight films, writes Republic’s Marc Iserlis.

title: UK cracks down: Hundreds of crypto exchanges hit with FCA warnings in Oct.
contentSnippet: The Financial Conduct Authority renewed its warnings advising residents of the United Kingdom not to use unregistered crypto exchanges.

title: Government Shutdown Threatens Crypto's Big Picture as it Stretches to Second-Longest
contentSnippet: The closure of the federal government isn't yet making a significant dent in the digital assets sector's interactions, but it's doing damage to long-term goals.

title: How to spot bull and bear market traps in crypto before they catch you
contentSnippet: Learn to spot fake breakouts in crypto using funding, OI and volume signals — and avoid bull and bear trap setups.

title: Google Claims Quantum Breakthrough to Reignite Bitcoin Ramifications Debate
contentSnippet: Google said it achieved a "quantum advantage," with its Willow chip completing a calculation that would take classical supercomputers thousands of times longer.

title: Bitcoin Miner Core Scientific Upgraded to Buy as HPC Momentum Builds: B. Riley
contentSnippet: The bank also reaffirmed TeraWulf (WULF) as its top pick in the sector.

title: Stellar Drops 5% Breaking Below $0.32 Support
contentSnippet: Technical selling pressure mounts as XLM breaks key support amid 74% volume spike above average.

title: T. Rowe Price Files to Launch Active Crypto ETF in Strategic Pivot
contentSnippet: The $1.8T mutual fund giant is seeking SEC approval for its first crypto ETF, marking a bold move into digital assets.

title: HBAR Drops 5.4% to $0.1695 as Key Support Crumbles
contentSnippet: Sustained selling pressure overwhelms brief intraday rally attempt as technical breakdown accelerates through critical price levels.

title: NHL Becomes First Major Sports League to License Trademarks to Prediction Markets
contentSnippet: The NHL's team-up with Polymarket and Kalshi arrives as prediction markets hit record $2 billion in weekly volume, led by sports activity.

title: UK Regulator Sues Crypto Exchange HTX for Unlawful Promotion of Digital Assets
contentSnippet: The financial watchdog previously issued warnings going back to 2023 about the exchange, which has links to Tron founder Justin Sun.

title: If Bitcoin isn’t ‘crypto,’ what makes it different?
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s design, governance and regulation set it apart from crypto. From supply rules to ETFs, it now sits in a category of its own.

title: Kraken Revenue More Than Doubled in Q3 as Company Preps for Possible IPO
contentSnippet: The company's adjusted earnings before taxes and other items reached $178.6 million, up 124% quarter-over-quarter, with volume rising 23% to $561.9 billion.

title: Forget GameStop: Meme Stock Traders Are Now Pumping Beyond Meat—Here's Why
contentSnippet: Roaring Kitty and meme stock traders pushed GameStop (GME) to unprecedented highs in 2021. Can history repeat with Beyond Meat (BYND)?

title: Bitcoin closes $107K CME gap as focus shifts to Friday's key CPI print
contentSnippet: Bitcoin erased its gold divergence to bounce at $106,000, closing the weekend’s CME futures gap, but left traders unimpressed.

title: Crypto chop continues, Gold drops, DraftKings buys prediction market
contentSnippet: Crypto chop continues, tariff headlines dominate. ZEC breaks $300 before falling, leads altcoins. Waller signs Fed’s shift towards embracing crypto. ETH Foundation moves $654m ETH. BlackRock trying to

title: Bitcoin Primed for Dip to $100K Before 'Uptober' Resumes, Says Standard Chartered
contentSnippet: Gold weakened against Bitcoin on Tuesday.

title: Stablecoin Transaction Volume Up 83% Year-on-Year: TRM Labs
contentSnippet: The analytics firm told Decrypt ‘we are still just at the beginning of the stablecoin adoption curve,’ following record gains.

title: Crypto Exchanges Begin Delisting Kadena After 65% Price Plunge on Shutdown Plans
contentSnippet: Bybit and OKX are both pulling KDA trading services after the company behind the Kadena blockchain said it’s closing down.

title: Gold’s worst dip in years wipes $2.5T: How does Bitcoin match up?
contentSnippet: Gold suffered a massive $2.5 trillion market cap dip comparable to the entire Bitcoin market, showing that “safe-haven” assets are not immune to volatility.

title: BNB price analysis: Here’s why bulls must hold $1K
contentSnippet: Fewer buyers and weakening price technicals could spell trouble for the BNB price, as bulls must hold $1,000 support or face a deeper correction.

title: China’s budget AIs are trouncing ChatGPT and Grok at crypto trading
contentSnippet: DeepSeek was the only AI model to generate a positive return on Wednesday, despite having the smallest development budget among its peers.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Bitcoin price to 6X in 2026? M2 supply boom sparks COVID-19 comparisons
contentSnippet: Bitcoin price analysis hinted that the correlation between BTC price action and M2 money supply may end in a repeat of the late 2020 bull run.

title: Open banking will keep America at the forefront of financial innovation
contentSnippet: Open banking facilitates access to rural financial services and digital asset integration, but traditional banks pose potential restrictions.

title: DraftKings Prediction Market App Will Focus on States Without Legal Sports Betting
contentSnippet: DraftKings buys Railbird to launch prediction market app as industry volume tops $2B weekly and growth projections soar to $95B by 2035.

title: FalconX to Acquire 21Shares in Latest Crypto Industry Deal
contentSnippet: The institutional trading firm is set to buy the Swiss ETP issuer behind more than $11 billion in listed crypto products.

title: Morning Minute: DraftKings Bets Big on Prediction Markets
contentSnippet: DraftKings is officially entering the prediction market space and launching a new app, though sports are not on its immediate roadmap.

title: CRYPTO PUMPING! COBIE & UP ONLY ARE BACK!
contentSnippet: Crypto Dips Despite Continue Strength in Stocks. Another $320m of Liquidations in Drop. Fed to Host Crypto Innovation Conference Today. Strategy Bought $19m Btc, Bitmine Buys $251m Eth. Coinbase Buys

title: ソラナ（SOL）現物ETF、香港で初承認　10月27日取引開始
contentSnippet: 香港証券監督委員会がアジア初となるソラナ現物ETFを承認。ChinaAMC運用（香港）で10月27日取引開始。ビットコイン、イーサリアムに続く3番目の仮想通貨ETFとして、米国市場に先駆けた上場となる。

title: 仮想通貨取引、米国で前年比50%増　トランプ効果鮮明に＝2025上半期報告
contentSnippet: TRMラボの最新報告書によると、トランプ政権下で米国の仮想通貨取引高が50%増の1兆ドル超に。日本は普及ランキング9位に上昇。ステーブルコインは前年比83%増で過去最高を記録。

title: 金融審議会、暗号資産のインサイダー取引規制と銀行の取扱要件が焦点に
contentSnippet: 金融審議会が暗号資産のインサイダー取引規制案を提示。DEX・P2P取引も対象に。銀行本体の取扱いは慎重に検討する一方、子会社には門戸を開く方針。無登録業者への罰則も強化へ。

title: 「量子コンピュータはビットコインの最大リスク」、CoinMetrics共同創設者が警告
contentSnippet: CoinMetrics共同創業者ニック・カーター氏が、量子コンピュータがビットコインの暗号セキュリティに及ぼす脅威について警告する論説を発表。ビットコインのセキュリティの仕組みについて解説し、量子技術の進化が現在の状況を変える可能性があると指摘した。

title: リミックスポイント、米ビットワイズのBTC保有企業ETFに新規採用
contentSnippet: ビットワイズが3月から提供する「OWNB」ETFに、日本企業メタプラネット、リミックスポイント、ネクソンも組み入れられている。

title: ビットコインL2「Arkade」ベータ版公開、BTC上のステーブルコインや貸借の基盤に
contentSnippet: Ark LabsがビットコインL2「Arkade」のベータ版を公開した。オフチェーンでステーブルコインやレンディング機能を実現し、ライトニングネットワークを補完する新基盤を目指す。

title: 米国初で百貨店チェーンが仮想通貨決済導入、創業110年の「Bealls」
contentSnippet: 創業110年の米百貨店チェーンBeallsが仮想通貨決済を導入。Flexa経由でビットコイン、イーサリアムなどに対応。全米初、複数ブロックチェーンから同時決済を受け入れる小売業者に。

title: 「Saga」スマホ、発売から2年でサポート終了　次世代端末「シーカー」へ移行
contentSnippet: ソラナ・モバイルが仮想通貨スマホ「サガ」のサポートを発売から2年で終了。2万台の完売を成し遂げ、ミームコインのエアドロップで注目を集めた。同社は現在、第2世代端末「シーカー」に注力し、15万台以上の予約を獲得している。

title: イーサリアム『フサカ』、取引のガス上限を導入
contentSnippet: イーサリアムは次期アップグレード「フサカ」でEIP-7825を導入し、1取引あたりのガス上限を約1678万に制限する。ホレスキーとセポリアで既に稼働しており、12月3日のメインネット実装を予定している。

title: イーサリアム元開発者が財団批判　ヴィタリックの影響力と支配層の存在を指摘
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨イーサリアムの元コア開発者シラージ氏がイーサリアム財団の体制を批判。ヴィタリック氏を中心とした支配層の存在や報酬格差を指摘し、ポリゴンCEOも不満を表明した。
